golden_rules.query: Is electrical supply adequate for installation?
golden_rules.test_method: Check electrical supply against nameplate requirements
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper power supply could damage unit or cause malfunction

golden_rules.query: Is safety lock feature engaged?
golden_rules.test_method: Verify indicator light status
golden_rules.failure_indication: Safety lock not functioning, unit may operate unexpectedly

golden_rules.query: Does automatic shut-off activate?
golden_rules.expected_value: Unit powers down after preset time limit
golden_rules.test_method: Run unit until auto shut-off time
golden_rules.failure_indication: Safety feature failure if unit continues running

golden_rules.query: Are indicator lights functioning?
golden_rules.expected_value: All lights illuminate when respective functions active
golden_rules.test_method: Cycle through all operations checking indicators
golden_rules.failure_indication: Control system or display malfunction

golden_rules.query: Is drain properly connected?
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection and water test
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of water damage or improper drainage

golden_rules.query: Is grill properly connected to power source?
golden_rules.expected_value: 48VDC power supply connected and LED indicator lit
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of power connection and LED status
golden_rules.failure_indication: No power to unit, LED unlit, grill non-functional

golden_rules.query: Does touch control panel respond to input?
golden_rules.expected_value: Panel illuminates and responds to touch within 1 second
golden_rules.test_method: Press power button and observe response
golden_rules.failure_indication: Control panel unresponsive or delayed response indicates system fault

golden_rules.query: Is temperature display accurate?
golden_rules.expected_value: Display shows actual temperature within ±5°F of set point
golden_rules.test_method: Compare displayed temperature with calibrated thermometer
golden_rules.failure_indication: Inaccurate temperature reading indicates sensor failure

golden_rules.query: Does automatic shutoff function work?
golden_rules.expected_value: Unit powers down after 90 minutes of continuous operation
golden_rules.test_method: Run unit for 90 minutes and verify shutdown
golden_rules.failure_indication: Failure to auto-shutdown indicates safety timer malfunction

golden_rules.query: Is grill stored properly when not in use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Stored indoors and out of children's reach
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of storage location
golden_rules.failure_indication: Grill exposed to elements or accessible to children

golden_rules.query: Is rain protection adequate?
golden_rules.test_method: Visual verification of shelter/cover
golden_rules.failure_indication: Direct exposure to rain possible

golden_rules.query: Is glass-ceramic surface intact?
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of cooking surface
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of electrical shock due to cracked surface
models: All KENYON Grills with glass-ceramic surfaces

golden_rules.query: Is minimum water level maintained in drip tray?
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of drip tray before use
golden_rules.failure_indication: Fire hazard due to insufficient water

golden_rules.query: Are power cords and wires intact?
golden_rules.expected_value: No visible damage to wires or cords
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of electrical components
golden_rules.failure_indication: Malfunction risk due to damaged wires

golden_rules.query: Is drip tray cleaned after use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Clean drip tray with no residue
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection after each use
golden_rules.failure_indication: Fire hazard due to accumulated grease

golden_rules.query: Is grill cool before maintenance?
golden_rules.test_method: Temperature check before handling components
golden_rules.failure_indication: Burn hazard if maintenance performed while hot

golden_rules.query: Is input voltage within acceptable range for B70750?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure DC voltage at power input terminals
golden_rules.failure_indication: Voltage outside range may damage unit or cause malfunction

golden_rules.query: Is power consumption within specification for B70750?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure current draw during operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect power consumption indicates electrical fault

golden_rules.query: Does B70750 built-in grill fit specified cutout dimensions?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure cutout dimensions before installation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper fit may affect ventilation and mounting security

golden_rules.query: Is input voltage within acceptable range for B70790?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure DC voltage at power input terminals
golden_rules.failure_indication: Voltage outside range may damage unit or cause malfunction

golden_rules.query: Is power consumption within specification for B70790?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure current draw during operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect power consumption indicates electrical fault

golden_rules.query: Is drain fitting properly installed on B70750?
golden_rules.expected_value: 1 inch drain fitting extending below unit
golden_rules.test_method: Verify drain fitting presence and measurement
golden_rules.failure_indication: Missing or improper drain fitting may cause drainage issues

golden_rules.query: Is grill properly grounded?
golden_rules.test_method: Professional inspection
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of electrical shock

golden_rules.query: What is the power supply rating?
golden_rules.expected_value: DC power with 30-amp circuit breaker protection
golden_rules.test_method: Verify circuit breaker rating
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper power supply protection

golden_rules.query: Is RCD protection present?
golden_rules.expected_value: RCD with rated residual operating current not exceeding 30A
golden_rules.test_method: Verify RCD specifications
golden_rules.failure_indication: Missing safety protection

golden_rules.query: Is input voltage within acceptable range?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure DC voltage at power input terminals
golden_rules.failure_indication: Voltage outside range may damage unit or cause malfunction

golden_rules.query: Does unit draw correct amperage?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure current draw during operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect amperage indicates electrical fault or component failure

golden_rules.query: Is power output correct?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure power output during operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect wattage indicates performance issue

golden_rules.query: Are installation dimensions correct?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure physical dimensions of unit
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect dimensions may prevent proper installation

golden_rules.query: Are cutout dimensions correct?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure cutout opening dimensions
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect cutout size will prevent proper fit

golden_rules.query: Is drain fitting height correct?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure height of drain fitting
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect drain height may cause drainage issues

golden_rules.query: What utensils must be used for grilling?
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of utensils being used
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of surface damage or unsafe material contact

golden_rules.query: Is drip tray properly installed?
golden_rules.expected_value: Drip tray fully inserted and element bracket resting on support bracket
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of drip tray position
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper liquid collection, fire hazard

golden_rules.query: Is there liquid in drip tray before use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Non-flammable liquid present in drip tray bottom
golden_rules.test_method: Visual check of drip tray before operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of smoke and improper operation

golden_rules.query: What is the preheat temperature for steak?
golden_rules.test_method: Temperature gauge reading after 5-7 minutes preheat
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper cooking temperature

golden_rules.query: What is the preheat temperature for burgers?
golden_rules.test_method: Temperature gauge reading after 5-7 minutes preheat
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper cooking temperature

golden_rules.query: What is the preheat temperature for pork and fish?
golden_rules.test_method: Temperature gauge reading after 5-7 minutes preheat
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper cooking temperature

golden_rules.query: What is the preheat temperature for vegetables?
golden_rules.test_method: Temperature gauge reading after 5-7 minutes preheat
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper cooking temperature

golden_rules.query: Is grill surface cool enough for cleaning?
golden_rules.test_method: Careful touch test of surface
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of burns if cleaning attempted too soon

golden_rules.query: Is the stainless steel surface clean before use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Surface is clean and free of residue
golden_rules.test_method: Wipe with damp cloth and visually inspect
golden_rules.failure_indication: Visible residue or debris from previous grilling remains on surface

golden_rules.query: Has monthly stainless steel cleaner been applied?
golden_rules.expected_value: Stainless steel cleaner applied within last 30 days
golden_rules.test_method: Check maintenance log and visual inspection
golden_rules.failure_indication: Dulling or staining of stainless steel surfaces

golden_rules.query: Is touch control area clean and sealed?
golden_rules.expected_value: Ceramic glass is clean and seal intact
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection and glass cleaner application
golden_rules.failure_indication: Stains present or seal compromise visible
models: All Kenyon Grills with Touch Controls

golden_rules.query: Is correct water level in drip tray before grilling?
golden_rules.expected_value: 1 cup water present in drip tray
golden_rules.test_method: Measure water volume in drip tray
golden_rules.failure_indication: Insufficient or no water in drip tray

golden_rules.query: Is grill properly preheated?
golden_rules.test_method: Time preheat duration
golden_rules.failure_indication: Insufficient preheat time or temperature

golden_rules.query: What should be used to extinguish a grease fire?
golden_rules.expected_value: Dry chemical or foam-type extinguisher, or smothering - NEVER water
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of fire safety equipment and posted procedures
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect fire suppression methods could spread fire

golden_rules.query: How often must drip tray be cleaned?
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of drip tray after use
golden_rules.failure_indication: Grease accumulation, fire hazard, warranty void

golden_rules.query: What type of pot holders are safe to use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Only dry pot holders - no moist/damp holders or towels
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of pot holders
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of steam burns

golden_rules.query: Is grill grate intact and unbroken?
golden_rules.expected_value: Grate should be completely intact with no breaks or cracks
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of grate before each use
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of electric shock or fire from grease contact with element

golden_rules.query: What cleaning methods are prohibited?
golden_rules.expected_value: No pressurized water or pressurized cleaners
golden_rules.test_method: Review of cleaning procedures and practices
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of electric shock, void warranty

golden_rules.query: How much water should be in drip tray before cooking?
golden_rules.expected_value: 2 cups or enough to cover bottom of pan
golden_rules.test_method: Measure water level in drip tray
golden_rules.failure_indication: Excessive smoke during operation

golden_rules.query: Can grill be operated with damaged wires?
golden_rules.expected_value: No operation with any damaged wires
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of all wiring before use
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of malfunction or electrical hazard

golden_rules.query: Is LED light array illuminated when element is on?
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of LED array when control is ON
golden_rules.failure_indication: Element may not be receiving power or LED failure

golden_rules.query: Does HOT indicator light activate when cooking grate is warm?
golden_rules.expected_value: HOT light illuminated when surface is above safe touch temperature
golden_rules.test_method: Observe HOT light during and after cooking operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Safety system failure or temperature sensor malfunction

golden_rules.query: Does safety lock prevent power adjustment when grill is ON?
golden_rules.expected_value: Power settings cannot be adjusted when lock is activated
golden_rules.test_method: Attempt to adjust power settings with lock enabled
golden_rules.failure_indication: Lock mechanism failure

golden_rules.query: Does master power button override lock when grill is ON?
golden_rules.expected_value: Master power button turns off grill even when locked
golden_rules.test_method: Press master power button while unit is locked and running
golden_rules.failure_indication: Emergency shutoff failure

golden_rules.query: Does lock prevent all control panel functions when grill is OFF?
golden_rules.expected_value: No control panel functions work when locked and off
golden_rules.test_method: Attempt to activate controls while unit is locked and off
golden_rules.failure_indication: Lock system malfunction

golden_rules.query: Does unit auto-shutdown if element not activated within 15 seconds?
golden_rules.expected_value: Grill de-powers after 15 seconds of inactivity after initial power-on
golden_rules.test_method: Power on unit and wait 15 seconds without activating element
golden_rules.failure_indication: Auto-shutdown timer malfunction

golden_rules.query: Does element power activation require 2-second button hold?
golden_rules.expected_value: Element activates only after 2-second continuous button press
golden_rules.test_method: Test element power button with various press durations
golden_rules.failure_indication: Timer circuit failure or button malfunction

golden_rules.query: Does cooking timer shut off heating element at end of set time?
golden_rules.expected_value: Yes, heating element automatically shuts off
golden_rules.test_method: Set cooking timer and verify element turns off when time expires
golden_rules.failure_indication: Heating element remains on after timer expires

golden_rules.query: What is the initial time increment for timer settings?
golden_rules.test_method: Press + button and verify increment steps
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect time increment steps

golden_rules.query: What is the secondary time increment for timer settings?
golden_rules.test_method: Press + button past 10 minutes and verify increment steps
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect time increment steps above 10 minutes

golden_rules.query: Does timer deactivate if no time set?
golden_rules.test_method: Activate timer without setting time and measure deactivation time
golden_rules.failure_indication: Timer doesn't auto-deactivate or wrong timing

golden_rules.query: Does cooking timer display switch from minutes to seconds in final minute?
golden_rules.expected_value: Yes, changes to seconds when less than one minute remains
golden_rules.test_method: Set short timer and observe display format change
golden_rules.failure_indication: Display format doesn't switch to seconds

golden_rules.query: What is the cooking timer end alarm pattern?
golden_rules.expected_value: Single beep every 5 seconds until power button touched or 30 second timeout
golden_rules.test_method: Let cooking timer expire and verify alarm pattern
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect alarm pattern or timing

golden_rules.query: What is the kitchen timer end alarm pattern?
golden_rules.expected_value: Double beep every 10 seconds for 3 minutes or until power button touched
golden_rules.test_method: Let kitchen timer expire and verify alarm pattern
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect alarm pattern or timing

golden_rules.query: What is the default heat level when starting any element?
golden_rules.test_method: Power on element and observe initial setting
golden_rules.failure_indication: Element starts at non-zero level

golden_rules.query: How long can element remain at 0 before auto-shutdown?
golden_rules.test_method: Set element to 0 and time until de-power
golden_rules.failure_indication: Element remains powered after 15 seconds at 0

golden_rules.query: What is the temperature range in Fahrenheit?
golden_rules.test_method: Verify minimum and maximum temperature settings
golden_rules.failure_indication: Temperature range falls outside specified limits

golden_rules.query: What is the temperature range in Celsius?
golden_rules.test_method: Verify minimum and maximum temperature settings in Celsius
golden_rules.failure_indication: Temperature range falls outside specified limits

golden_rules.query: What are the temperature increment steps?
golden_rules.test_method: Verify temperature changes in correct increments
golden_rules.failure_indication: Temperature changes in different increment steps

golden_rules.query: What is the default temperature on startup?
golden_rules.test_method: Power on unit and verify initial temperature setting
golden_rules.failure_indication: Different default temperature on startup

golden_rules.query: How many heat level increments are available?
golden_rules.test_method: Count LED light array positions
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect number of heat level settings

golden_rules.query: Does temperature setting persist after reaching target?
golden_rules.test_method: Set temperature and monitor after reaching target
golden_rules.failure_indication: Temperature setting changes without user input

golden_rules.query: Do temperature units persist between uses?
golden_rules.expected_value: Yes, chosen units remain until manually changed
golden_rules.test_method: Set units, power cycle, verify setting remains
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unit preference resets between uses

golden_rules.query: Does heat setting 1-4 shut off automatically?
golden_rules.test_method: Set temperature and time operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unit continues running beyond 90 minutes

golden_rules.query: Does heat setting 5-10 shut off automatically?
golden_rules.test_method: Set temperature and time operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unit continues running beyond 70 minutes

golden_rules.query: Does heat setting 11-16 shut off automatically?
golden_rules.test_method: Set temperature and time operation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unit continues running beyond 60 minutes

golden_rules.query: Are settings 1-2 appropriate for griddle eggs?
golden_rules.expected_value: Eggs cook properly on griddle at settings 1-2
golden_rules.test_method: Cook eggs on griddle at specified setting
golden_rules.failure_indication: Eggs cook too fast or too slow

golden_rules.query: Are settings 3-4 appropriate for pancakes and french toast?
golden_rules.expected_value: Pancakes and french toast cook properly at settings 3-4
golden_rules.test_method: Cook pancakes/french toast at specified setting
golden_rules.failure_indication: Food cooks too fast or too slow

golden_rules.query: Does lid position affect cooking performance?
golden_rules.expected_value: Optimal cooking performance with lid down/closed
golden_rules.test_method: Compare cooking results with lid open vs closed
golden_rules.failure_indication: No significant difference in cooking performance with lid position

golden_rules.query: Is unit displaying error code E04?
golden_rules.test_method: Check display panel for error codes
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unit is operating at high temperature
models: Single Zone Grill with IntelliKEN Touch

golden_rules.query: Are errors E06, E07, E08, or E09 displayed?
golden_rules.test_method: Check display panel for error codes
golden_rules.failure_indication: Internal electronic control issue requiring service
models: Single Zone Grill with IntelliKEN Touch

golden_rules.query: Is error E10 displayed?
golden_rules.test_method: Check display panel for error codes
golden_rules.failure_indication: Multiple control functions activated simultaneously
models: Single Zone Grill with IntelliKEN Touch
related_procedures: Use single control input at a time

golden_rules.query: Does unit respond to error reset procedure?
golden_rules.test_method: De-power and restart unit
golden_rules.failure_indication: Persistent error condition requiring service
models: Single Zone Grill with IntelliKEN Touch

golden_rules.query: Is unit serviceable by user?
golden_rules.test_method: Check manual maintenance section
golden_rules.failure_indication: Sealed unit requiring authorized service only
models: Single Zone Grill with IntelliKEN Touch

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum safe temperature for collapsing the silicone lid?
golden_rules.test_method: Wait for grill to cool and verify temperature by careful touch test
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of burns and lid damage if collapsed while hot

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum collapsed height of the silicone lid?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure collapsed lid height with ruler
golden_rules.failure_indication: Lid damage or improper assembly if height exceeds 2 inches when fully collapsed

golden_rules.query: Is the quick release pin fully engaged in hinge?
golden_rules.expected_value: Pin fully inserted through hinge mechanism
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of pin placement
golden_rules.failure_indication: Lid may detach unexpectedly if pin not properly engaged

golden_rules.query: Are all three sides of lid properly vented?
golden_rules.expected_value: Visible vent openings on three sides of lid
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of vent presence and clearance
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper ventilation and heat management if vents are blocked or missing

golden_rules.query: Can heating element pivot upward?
golden_rules.expected_value: Element should pivot up and stay in position
golden_rules.test_method: Manually lift heating element
golden_rules.failure_indication: Element does not stay up or pivot freely

golden_rules.query: Is baffle tray installed during operation?
golden_rules.expected_value: Baffle tray must be present and properly seated
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection before use
golden_rules.failure_indication: Missing or improperly placed baffle tray

golden_rules.query: Is drip tray properly positioned in baffle tray?
golden_rules.expected_value: Drip tray completely contained within baffle tray edges
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of tray placement
golden_rules.failure_indication: Drip tray rim protruding beyond baffle tray

golden_rules.query: Is drip tray emptied after use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Drip tray empty and clean after each use
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection post-cooking
golden_rules.failure_indication: Accumulated fat and juices from previous use

golden_rules.query: Is water present in drip tray before cooking?
golden_rules.expected_value: 2 cups water or enough to cover bottom
golden_rules.test_method: Visual check of water level pre-cooking
golden_rules.failure_indication: Smoking during operation due to insufficient water

golden_rules.query: Is grate cleaned after each use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Grate washed in warm soapy water after use
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of grate cleanliness
golden_rules.failure_indication: Residue or debris on grate surface

golden_rules.query: Are all package contents present?
golden_rules.expected_value: VDC IntelliKEN Touch, Stainless steel cleaner, 3 feet drain hose, 4 mounting brass fitting screws
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection and count of package contents against checklist
golden_rules.failure_indication: Missing or damaged components requiring immediate contact with KENYON

golden_rules.query: Is power supply voltage within acceptable range?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure DC voltage at installation point with voltmeter
golden_rules.failure_indication: Voltage outside spec requires licensed electrician consultation

golden_rules.query: Is power supply wiring gauge correct for installation distance?
golden_rules.expected_value: 8 AWG for runs up to 40 feet
golden_rules.test_method: Verify wire gauge marking or measure wire diameter
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect wire gauge may cause voltage drop or safety hazard

golden_rules.query: Is maximum connected load within specifications?
golden_rules.test_method: Check power supply rating and load calculations
golden_rules.failure_indication: Exceeding load specifications may cause system failure or safety hazard

golden_rules.query: Is disconnect means properly installed?
golden_rules.expected_value: Disconnect incorporated in fixed wiring per wiring rules
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of wiring installation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Missing or improper disconnect violates electrical codes

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum clearance between cooking surface and unprotected cabinet?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure vertical distance from cooking surface to cabinet bottom
golden_rules.failure_indication: Fire hazard due to insufficient clearance

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum clearance with protected cabinet bottom?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure vertical distance when cabinet has proper flame retardant protection
golden_rules.failure_indication: Fire hazard due to insufficient clearance

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum clearance from backsplash to grill edge?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure horizontal distance from backsplash to grill edge
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper installation clearance

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum clearance from counter front to grill?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure horizontal distance from counter front edge to grill
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper installation clearance

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum clearance between grill bottom and combustible surface below?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure vertical gap between grill bottom and any combustible surface
golden_rules.failure_indication: Fire hazard due to insufficient ventilation

golden_rules.query: What is the maximum depth of overhead cabinets?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure cabinet depth above grill
golden_rules.failure_indication: Installation does not meet safety specifications

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum countertop height from floor?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure vertical distance from floor to countertop surface
golden_rules.failure_indication: Installation height incorrect

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum clearance from adjacent surfaces in Canada?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure distance from grill to any adjacent surface
golden_rules.failure_indication: Does not meet Canadian installation requirements

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum horizontal projection required for range hood beyond cabinet bottom?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure distance from cabinet bottom edge to hood edge with tape measure
golden_rules.failure_indication: Insufficient clearance creates burn hazard from reaching over heated surface

golden_rules.query: What are the required ventilation openings in cabinet?
golden_rules.expected_value: Two openings of 8 square inches each - one for intake, one for exhaust
golden_rules.test_method: Measure opening dimensions to verify square inch area
golden_rules.failure_indication: Insufficient ventilation causing overheating

golden_rules.query: What additional ventilation is needed above 85°F/30°C ambient temperature?
golden_rules.expected_value: Larger than 8 square inch openings required
golden_rules.test_method: Measure ambient temperature and verify increased opening sizes
golden_rules.failure_indication: Overheating in high ambient temperature conditions

golden_rules.query: What is the minimum corner radius for countertop cutout?
golden_rules.test_method: Measure radius of cutout corners
golden_rules.failure_indication: Risk of countertop cracking

golden_rules.query: What is the correct drain fitting specification?
golden_rules.expected_value: 1/2 inch NPT brass pipe fitting with 90° brass elbow
golden_rules.test_method: Verify fitting type and size
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper drainage connection

golden_rules.query: Is protective plastic film completely removed from lid, trim flange and glass panel?
golden_rules.expected_value: No plastic film visible on any surface
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection of all surfaces
golden_rules.failure_indication: Remaining plastic film could melt during operation and damage surfaces

golden_rules.query: Has initial cleaning with stainless steel/glass cleaner been performed?
golden_rules.expected_value: All surfaces clean and free of adhesive residue and manufacturing oils
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection and tactile check for residue
golden_rules.failure_indication: Contamination from manufacturing process remains on surfaces

golden_rules.query: Have nonstick coated grates been washed before first use?
golden_rules.expected_value: Grates cleaned with warm soapy water
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection and verification of cleaning procedure completion
golden_rules.failure_indication: Manufacturing residue may contaminate food if not cleaned

golden_rules.query: Is the product within initial warranty period?
golden_rules.expected_value: Within 3 years from installation OR 42 months from invoice date
golden_rules.test_method: Check installation/invoice documentation against current date
golden_rules.failure_indication: Product is outside standard warranty coverage period

golden_rules.query: Is stainless steel showing corrosion?
golden_rules.expected_value: No corrosion present with proper monthly maintenance
golden_rules.test_method: Visual inspection, photo documentation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Improper maintenance or defective material

golden_rules.query: Has service work been pre-authorized?
golden_rules.test_method: Verify authorization documentation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Service work may not be covered under warranty

golden_rules.query: Is service center authorized by Kenyon?
golden_rules.expected_value: Service center appears on Authorized Service Center list
golden_rules.test_method: Check against Kenyon's authorized service center database
golden_rules.failure_indication: Service work not eligible for warranty coverage

golden_rules.query: Is product being used as intended?
golden_rules.expected_value: Product used according to design specifications
golden_rules.test_method: Compare usage to product manual specifications
golden_rules.failure_indication: Warranty void due to improper application
